item.description:
At our next meetup, we'll be going over Rails 3. What's new, what's changed, and what's awesome about it. This should be an awesome meetup.

We're planning to have this meetup on Thursday, November 18 at Cantina's office (located in Newton Center). It will start at 7pm to give everyone ample time to get there.

There will be beer.

We hope to see you!

We apologize for the short notice on this one.

Parking / Directions:

The meetup will be held at 15 Cypress St #200 in Newton Center, MA (there's a building with a giant "Fia" sign - the office is located to the right up the stairs). There is a parking lot directly across the street, and the MBTA D - Green Line train is on the other side of the parking lot (at the Newton Center stop).
item.name: On Rails 3
